signals.Ask: We need to have our forms set up before proceeding with the migration.
signals.Evidence: I think we need that set up before anything else is ready.

signals.Ask: I will create all the custom fields in Hiver prior to migration.
signals.Evidence: So then I should go ahead, and create all the custom fields because those won't be here.

signals.Ask: We prefer to kick off the migration on a Wednesday night to avoid disruption during peak times.
signals.Evidence: Our student deadlines is actually on the weekend... midweek Wednesday, Thursday, Friday is actually a little bit calmer.

signals.Ask: We want open and pending tickets to be prioritized during the migration.
signals.Evidence: Those are the ones that we actually want over there first.

signals.Ask: All agent accounts must be created prior to the migration.
signals.Evidence: You'll have to add them as users first.
